prTitle: feat: create Image component with lazy loading
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented a fully-featured Image component with lazy loading functionality for the lingerie website. This component provides a solid foundation for optimal image loading performance across the application.

### Key Features
- ✅ Native lazy loading using `loading='lazy'` attribute
- ✅ Error handling with fallback images and error states
- ✅ Required alt text prop (enforced via PropTypes)
- ✅ Aspect ratio support to prevent layout shift
- ✅ Responsive design with object-fit CSS properties
- ✅ CSS custom properties for theming
- ✅ Loading and loaded states with smooth transitions
- ✅ onLoad and onError callback support
- ✅ Dark mode and reduced motion accessibility support

### Implementation Details
- **Image.jsx**: React component with comprehensive prop validation and state management
- **Image.module.css**: CSS module with responsive styling, accessibility features, and theming support
- **Comprehensive testing**: 9 test cases covering all functionality
- **Complete React setup**: Vite configuration, demo app, and build system

### Acceptance Criteria Met
- [x] Image.jsx implements loading='lazy' attribute
- [x] Component handles image load errors with fallback or error state
- [x] Alt text is required prop (enforced via PropTypes)
- [x] Image.module.css includes object-fit and aspect ratio support
- [x] Component prevents layout shift during image loading

### Testing
- All 9 unit tests passing
- Build successful with no errors
- Demo app included for visual verification

Closes #88
